programme.title: Feminism in American 1993
programme.short_synopsis: 25 years after The Feminine Mystique, how has feminism progressed in America?
programme.medium_synopsis: The Miss America Pageant, the progress of feminism in the US, 25 years of Betty Friedan's The Feminine Mystique and the problem of sexual harassment.
